title: "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline"
body:
Hi,

Played a game this morning then all of a sudden i cant log in again. It says "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline", when my internet was still working.

I have tried all of these below, is there anything else to do?

- Restarted router and computer. 
- Tried to add different DNS. 
- Tried to Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config 
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad 
Find the line: gameflow-patcher-lock:
But i didnt have that line. Deleted that file anyway, a new one came up. No difference.
Asked my friend to send his file to me. Tried with and without the "line". No succes.
- Reinstalled the game a couple of times.


What else to do? Everything else working on my computer that needs internet (including other games). 


Cheers.

replies.body: Was this ever resolved? I have been having the same issue. Worked with the LOL support team as well as my ISP's support team. Still no resolution.

Modifying your game files won't do a whole lot, but you did good by adjusting DNS and power cycling your router.  I also recommend going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix up whatever is blocking you from the authentication server.  Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help as well by auto-configuring your firewall settings.
Hi, tried the internal fix in the client AND the Hextech. Even the steps in the link. Still doesnt work...

Aw, that's frustrating.  :(  Let's take a deeper look with you directly, and see if we can figure this out.  Grab the logs from the HRT and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will help out!
Ye, thanks. I've done it right now. You need ticket-number or something?
No ticket number necessary, a specialist from our tech team will reply back as soon as they can.
